data.title: State Water Board approves voluntary water sharing agreement for Russian River
data.excerpt: With ongoing drought conditions straining water supplies and creating uncertainty throughout California, the State Water Resources Control Board todayapproved a unique agreement that allows right holders in the Upper Russian River watershed to voluntarily reduce water use and share their available water.
data.author: Kalin Kipling
